actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston under the authority of the order of Aug 2, 89 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 101-112.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 212.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to designate segments of the East Fork of the Jemez River and of the Pecos River as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
short_title: East Fork of the Jemez River and the Pecos River Wild and Scenic Rivers Addition Act of 1989

summary.text: East Fork of the Jemez River and the Pecos River Wild and Scenic Rivers Addition Act of 1989 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate segments of the East Fork of the Jemez and Pecos Rivers, New Mexico, as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: Jemez and Pecos Rivers Wild and Scenic River Addition Act of 1989
East Fork of the Jemez River and the Pecos River Wild and Scenic Rivers Addition Act of 1989
East Fork of the Jemez River and the Pecos River Wild and Scenic Rivers Addition Act of 1989
A bill to designate segments of the East Fork of the Jemez River and of the Pecos River as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.
